casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
CREECH. No. 114P07-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Robert Spence, Jr., Smithfield, for Smithfield Housing Authority.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of April 2008 by Defendant to reconsider, rehear and review N.C. Supreme Court Writ requests:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
